events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund for my purchase. The product I got is not what I ordered.
The customer's message mentions a refund request, so the issue is categorized under Refund.
This case has been assigned to Agent Maria for further assistance with the refund process.
Hello! I’m Maria, and I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you please share the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure! My order number is 789654123, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item that was delivered to me.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund and arrange for the incorrect item to be picked up at no cost to you.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund offer. That works well for me, thank you for your help.
The refund has been processed, and arrangements have been made for the pickup. Please expect confirmation shortly.
We just wanted to check in to ensure the refund was received and that the pickup of the wrong item went smoothly for you.
Since all issues have been addressed and the refund confirmed, this case is now closed. Thank you for contacting support.
